tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr Sangeeta is an exceptional doctor who provided great support and guidance to me throughout my pregnancy as well as during the delivery of my child. She has a very friendly and non-judgemental approach, and patiently answered all of my queries all the time, putting my mind at ease. In my case, even though I had an uneventful pregnancy, we had to do an emergency C-section due to some last- minute complication but I felt completely safe knowing that Dr Sangeeta was operating on me. I would highly recommend all of my friends and family to seek an appointment with Dr Sangeeta,  should they ever need a medical intervention for a gynecology/ obstetrics issue.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: No doubt she is good doctor but the Environment at Bhandup Central Hospital is not at all great it causes great Stress to normal person unnecessarily person has no choice but to visit Fortis it should be young person friendly.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: High-Risk Pregnancy Care,Pregnancy,Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Labor and Delivery,Pregnant Women Counseling,
review:
I had consulted Dr. Sangeeta Raodeo for all the consultations over the 9 months of my pregnancy and the final delivery.
As this was my first pregnancy, I used to have many queries through the journey. Through the entire 9 months Dr. Sangeeta was consistently very approachable and friendly - addressing all our doubts and anxieties patiently. I always found her very calm and positive in all the interactions.

She has the approach of pregnancy being a very normal physiological process for a woman and should be treated as such. This approach helped me have a very smooth pregnancy while enjoying my normal life - including office work with minimum restrictions and medications.

I was diagnosed with Gestational Diabetes and low amniotic fluid levels (Oligohydramnios) during my pregnancy. Due to detection and intervention at the right time, we were able to mitigate the impact of both and still proceed to have a normal delivery.***** ***** ****** *** **** ** **** ******* *** experienced and but also very motivated to help her patients achieve their goals while ensuring their well being.
We had expressed to her early on during the pregnancy that we were keen on having a normal delivery. However due to GD and Oligohydramnios it was actually a high risk pregnancy and I would probably have been advised a caeserean by any other doctor.
However, thanks to the calculated risks taken by Dr. Sangeeta during my labour, we were able to have a normal delivery.

In addition, she had gone out of her way to help us select the hospital taking into account the financials and our medical needs. Also, she had personally reached out to us to counsel during the Covid wave 2 about the vaccinations.

I completely owe my very smooth pregnancy and delivery experience to Dr. Sangeeta Raodeo and would definitely recommend her.
Dr Sangeeta is genuine and friendly. She understands the worry of the patients. It was my first visit, I am satisfied. I would highly recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
My wife had pain on the right side of the abdomen. We went to Dr. Sangeeta based on feedback from Practo. 

Initial Observation: Dr. Sangeeta immediately pointed out that the uterus is big and is the cause of the issue. She advised USG and Imaging, based on which her analysis was partly correct. The issue was adnexal cyst, which was causing the pain, in addition to external fibroids on uterus.

Dr advised us to go for removal of both, since the uterus would have caused problems later (as had been the case with my cousin sister). From there on, Dr was available for consultation and guidance up to Surgery. She even explained the various possibilities that can happen after surgery, so that we are mentally prepared to handle the same.

On the admission day, Dr came to the room and patiently explained all the details again and answered some of our queries. Post-surgery, she called us to the room and explained the various actions taken during the surgery. 

Overall, a neighborhood doctor, smiling and confident, that we can confide on her and ask even the silliest of the questions to get it answered. I would recommend her to my friends & relatives.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review: I have consulted Sangeeta maam for my first pregnancy. However due to pandemic i was forced to change my doctor. But that pregnancy had not last long and i suffered a miscarriaged during third month. During the operation my case was again made complicated due to which i faced a lot of issues. After all i made a decision to go back to Sangeeta maam again who understand my case well and made the best decisions which is beneficial for me. She not only give me moral support during my hard times but she totaly ensures that my complications get resolved and my body will be ready for next pregnancy. Recently we blessed with a baby girl and we owe our child to her. She was there with me for all nine months of pregnacy and treated me like a friend. She answered all our queries with the smiling face and explained all the issues very well in detail. Before delivery she explained each and every point of delivery expenses and precautions. She is always ready to receive a call and provide us her support. It is rare to find a doctor who combines excellent medical care with such compassionate regards for her patients. So we are very thankfull to her for providing extended support during this pandemic time. She is an extraordinary doctor and highly recommended for those who are planning for the baby. Thanks maam for making us proud parents and i always feel greatful to have u as my gynecologist.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Sangeeta Raodeo has guided and supported us at every step of the 9 month pregnancy journey. We are glad we picked her from the very start. She is one of the few doctors who is very professional yet approachable enough to make you feel comfortable to ask all your queries and patiently answers them all . She is always smiling and puts you at ease with her calm and pleasant demeanour. She gave us sound advice at every followup. She also tried to do normal delivery till the end, something not commonly seen. However, we had to go for emergency C-section due to some last moment complications and she was there within minutes to handle it and deliver our baby despite it being past midnight hour.  Overall, we could not have asked for a better gynaec and forever grateful for her support throughout the 9 months. Strongly recommend her to all pregnant women for their check up and delivery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I met Dr. Sangeeta for my Pregnancy management and C Section Delivery! *** ** *** ** *** **** ************** * **** **** *** ** ****  Her gracious smile and warm attitude towards listening your problem will make you feel safe in her hands . She has miracle in her hands truly ðŸ’• During C section too , her voice in the background will make you feel calm and composed throughout the process . She will ensure that all checks are done and all processes are followed thoroughly. Her investigation skills are upto the mark and her treatment process is well above the mark! If you are looking for the best and trust worthy gynaecologist, she is highly recommended !! Thank you Dr. Sangeeta for everything âœ¨

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnancy,Cervical Cerclage,Caesarean Section (C Section),
review: We visited Dr Sangeeta from the mid of second trimester. Depsite not being her patient from the beginning, dr made us feel very comfortable and welcome. She is friendly and professional. She was even available on whatsapp to answer queries.  She performed an emergency cerclage in the nick of time and saved my baby.  Despite issues like GDM and high  BP, along with a cerclage, I was able to carry the baby till 37 weeks, all thanks to Dr Sangeeta and her team.  I delivered through C section and the entire experience was very comforting because Dr Raodeo gave us the confidence boost we needed time and again.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I was fortunate enough to come across Dr sangeeta during my pregnancy. She is one of the best gynecologist in mulund. Throughout my pregnancy journey she was always being supportive,  calmly answering all my queries have always tried her best way to keep me mentally and physically healthy. Thanks to her and her team from fortis i was able to deliver my baby normally. She kept me encouraging Throughout the whole process. I would highly recommend her for the ladies planing or who are pregnant to definitely consult her for your best experience.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review:
We have consulted Dr. Sangeeta from early stage of Pregnancy till post-delivery care. During each visit, she would diagnose and explain the developments in a layman's language and things to be taken care of during each trimester. In spite of high screening sugar during diagnosis, she recommended controlling it through diet patterns instead of taking additional medicines.
She was very supportive during the labour stage also and recommended normal delivery after the full term. 
She is always reachable on phone and gives quick advice for any queries. We highly recommend Dr. Sangeeta for any pregnancy-related issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I am blessed to have Dr. Sangeeta Raodeo by my side to go through my first pregnancy.  She is approachable, polite and has patience to listen to the patient . I approached her from 3rd trimester, and found myself lucky. I had delivered in 8th month due to sudden break down of water. Dr. Sangeeta had  successfully made my normal delivery ...  so far i know she always makes efforts to do normal delivery. She has good n quick decision making ability. 

I would surely recommend her for normal delivery. She is available in Vikhroli, Mulund as well. She has really good team with her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Heard about her from sister who went to surya hospital during pregnancy under Dr Salvi who was recommended to her by very renowned late Dr Manu Kothari and Lopa Mehta.  And Dr Sangeeta having worked with Dr salvi was assuring that she is best! 

I Had rough pregnancy. Delivered baby in Hong Kong with lot of health issues followed post partum. Approached Dr Sangeeta for "Online consulting". One of the best decision so far. She made my chattering mind calm despite of it being filled with zillion questions. Very positive, approachable, sensitive ( which is most important thing I was looking for) and someone who had good time available for my story. Met her when in India and I wished either her to be in hk to handhold me during pregnancy or myself to be in mumbai just for her! :) Thank you Dr Raodeo.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
This review is posted for treatment (ongoing) begun since 2018 to 2020 and counting. My wife underwent treatment for PCOS by an exceptional Doctor: Dr. Sangeeta Raodeo. The doctor not only identified the root cause but also worked with us to evaluate first and second line of treatment in a cost effective and timely manner. When we saw the benefits, we opted for a more direct intervention and the doctor pulled all ends together to ensure the surgery was completed over a weekend and my wife could rest and recuperate to join normal routine ASAP. 

The hospital staff was courteous and costs were under control. I used my company insurance and therefore the procedures were covered under cashless option. 

Post op follow up has been timely and helpful.

If you are coming to Fortis for gynaec treatment, look.no further than Dr. Sangeeta Raodeo. The doctor has won award in her field and is down to earth and spends time answering your questions ... Rare to find such doctor in gynaecology when everyone else just wants to work on easy cases, low hanging fruits.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I visited Dr Sangeeta Raodeo for the first time,but I never felt like it was my first visit. She is very clam and friendly . She listens to your problems and guides you with proper explanation. I feel very comfortable with her and she gives excellent medical care. Thank you for a great experience !!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We are extremely grateful for the exceptional service we received from Dr. Sangeeta Raodeo, ma'am. Her caring nature and seamless explanations of the process made our experience truly remarkable. Her expertise in handling high-risk pregnancy cases provided immense relief throughout the entire pregnancy term. We would like to express our heartfelt gratitude to ma'am for everything she does for us.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Ma'am has been a blessing for us when we recently had
 our first baby. Post Covid infection, I was suddenly in labour at only 26 weeks of pregnancy. But ma'am saved us from a preterm delivery with early diagnosis and perfect treatment. She took me from 26 weeks to all the way upto 38 weeks of full term pregnancy. Today i have a healthy baby boy, all thanks to ma'am.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: This was my first pregnancy. We consulted Dr. Sangeeta since the beginning of my pregnancy. Doctor is very patient, kind and listen to every concerns of her patient and answers each and every queries till the patient is satisfied. Doctor handled my case very smoothly till the end. I am very very much satisfied with the behaviour and treatment of the doctor and I would recommend our Doctor to every pregnant woman.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Doctor friendliness,
review: I was treated my wife for internal os is open. Which is most difficult to find out what to do, but when I meet Dr. Sangeeta Raodeo I was very satisfied. Doctor was very friendly nature. Explaining our health related issues very well. Doing good for us. Me and my wife was very happy to having treatment from Dr. Sangeeta mam.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: My husband and I had consulted Dr Sangeeta since the beginning of pregnancy and she treated me in the best possible way I could ever imagine.. Throughout the nine months of pregnancy and till delivery of our child she was there with us, guiding us and resolving our smallest of queries with a smiling and cheerful face. She ensured that the entire process was smooth... Today we owe our child to her and would highly highly recommend her

context: High-Risk Pregnancy Care,Pregnancy,Preconception Counseling,Pre-Pregnancy Counselling,Pregnancy care and management,
review: I had a great experience with Dr Sangeeta raodeo. She is a wonderful doctor. I owe my both pregnancies to her. She has expertise in her field. She is knowledgeable, investigative, friendly, calm, down to earth. Always ready to solve your queries with smiling face.Open for discussion. Very co-operative, caring & trustworthy doctor. I Highly recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: This is my second time with Dr Sangeeta. ***** ********* ************* *** ****** I had a great experience the first time I met with her. Highly recommend her. She definitely kept me calm in my first pregnancy. Always smiling and open to discussing any issues or questions you have

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Sangeeta was my gynaecologist throughout my pregnancy and she only delivered my baby. She is the best doctor one could ask for. She instantly puts you at ease and very patiently answers any queries you have. She is very knowledgeable about her field and gives some very sound recommendations. Her experience and advice is far superior to any other average gynaecologist and I couldnâ€™t recommend her enough.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I highly recommend Dr Sangita Roadeo. I consulted her at a difficult time when I was advised to undergo cerclage by my gynaec on an urgent basis. I approached  Dr. Raodeo for a 2nd opinion and she agreed to see us even on a holiday sensing my anxiety. She advised certain tests and  provided the right advice to avoid a cerclage and suggested an alternative course of action. I completed my full term without any complications. She was very supportive and thorough throughout my pregnancy. Her knowledge and care was exceptional. I felt safe and well taken care of under her guidance. I would definitely recommend them to any expecting mother.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I have visited Dr. Sangeeta after my first miscarriage. She guided us very well and suggested some test to find out the root cause. After doing the  test and check up, we came to know that I have protein s deficiency and ANA weak positive. She told us all treatment available and how I can have successful pregnancy . (High risk pregnancy)
I was constantly in touch with her pre-pregnancy and after conception she has taken care each and every minor thing in my pregnancy. With timely monitoring and treatment, I had cervical cerclage at 10th week, monitoring of sugar on diet control, PUPPP at 37weeks, I was on weekly progesterone and daily heparin. 
With all her support, timely decisions and care, I am blessed with a baby girl. I am really thankful to her, she is blessing to me.  She is always available on call and messages, very friendly and makes her patient calm in difficult situation.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My wife had pcos prob with history of one miscarriage.We consulted doctor Sangeetha for my wifeâ€™s conception  in fortis hospital,mumbai through Practo as well as we did online consultation later which was a fortune for us as we are blessed with a baby girl now .She treated my wife like her own daughter ,calmed my wife down as she was very upset with her miscarriage incident .Doctor Sangeetha is highly knowledgeable,friendly and an expert .Doctor gave medication for getting conceived and after my wifeâ€™s  first cycle after medication itself she conceived.Thank you doctor for making us proud parents !

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Sangeeta is a wonderful person to have as a doctor. Our first visit to her was very comforting. She is extremely friendly, patient, practical in her approach. Each of our visits was given justified time and all our queries were patiently answered. We barely had to wait during our scheduled visits and occasional waiting was intimated well in advance. Her explanations were easy to understand and interpret. She was available to us all of the times to answer silliest of the questions, comfor highest levels of anxiety and guide at crucial of the times. Post pregnancy care was well taken care of leaving us with the best of the memories of this wonderful phase of pregnancy. Could not have asked for more!
*** ** *** **** **** ***** ****** ******. Will listen to all your questions and has a very calming manner about her.
Doctor was really helpful and her diagnosis was very good. My wife got the results very quickly. She is friendly and address issues promptl
**** **** ****** *** explained me in detail and suggested medication and also given advise for other health problems

Explained everything very clearly and easily.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: we met doctor sangeeta for PCOD treatment and conception as i was unable to concieve after 3 years of marriage. she is very friendly , soft spoken with good expertise. doctor suggested IUI for cenception and luckily i concieved in first IUI itself. Today i am mother of 2 months old baby. we are gratefull for the treatment given by doctor and also refer to family and friends to visit her if needed.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctors seems good but the only problem is not punctual with time. The doctor is always late for by at least an hour. Doctorâ€™s busy schedule is understandable but respecting patients time should be also considered. She can directly give the appointment of later time when her arrival is surely confirmed. This is the second time I have left after waiting for her.

Dr. Sangeeta is very friendly and good at her work. I strongly recommend Dr Sangeeta.

There was a time issue practo that's what I have been told by the Dr. because becqi had booked a slot for 12 pm but Dr. was available after 12:30 PM.m, so i had to wait for almost more than 30 mins.

She is friendly and extremely careful with pregnancies. She was a huge help during my 2 month hospitalized bed rest. I would recommend her highly.
